typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		station_id as string,
		name as string,
		lat as string,
		long as string,
		dockcount as string,
		landmark as string,
		installation as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> stationdatat
stationdatat aggregate(groupBy(landmark),
	dockcount = sum(toInteger(dockcount))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sort(desc(dockcount, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['demoouttrial']) ~> sink1
